name: Island Escape XJam 2016
description:
Island Escape is a puzzle plattformer where you have to help critters escape through portrals by moving islands. Watch out for enemy critters and falling rocks. Made for X-Jam2016, theme floating islands.

Left mouse click and drag to move island, you can only move the grey ones. Escape will open the menu, 'R' will restart the level.

Sound Effects used:
